attributes.action: Cease from treating English people as 2nd class citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop giving priority to immigrants,when housing is allocated,stop lieing about immigration figures,stop providing asylum seekers with free TV sets and licences,when alot of hard working people in this country struggle to pay for them.Stop completely furnishing their homes for free,when there are lots of English families that need help,due to your policies,and last of all,try standing for election,so it is impossible to compare you to Mugabe

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
